projects.text:
html geledes geledes sexta-feira, 4 de janeiro de 2019 Anticorpos para o resgate! Como aumentar as defesas do meu filho Desde o ventre materno, o
organismo do beb est preparado para enfrentar mais vrus e
bactrias do que poderia parecer  primeira vista. O que est na
nossa mo? O sistema imunolgico nos protege do efeito
dos germes e as substncias desconhecidas e os destri. Essa
resposta imune inicia-se no tero: no ltimo trimestre de gestao,
comea a transmisso de anticorpos da me para o filho atravs da
placenta. Os anticorpos maternos protegem o recm-nascido durante os
seus primeiros seis meses de vida. Os recm-nascidos,
protegidos desde o 'tempo zero' As defesas dos recm-nascidos so
imaturas, mas comeam a gerar respostas de proteo desde o
momento de seu nascimento, j que tm trilhes de clulas do seu
sistema imunolgico. Ao gerar uma resposta rpida para as bactrias
que esto em seus intestinos, por exemplo, so capazes de evitar
que estes invadam sua corrente sangunea, o que lhes causam graves
doenas. Esta capacidade  essencial para enfrentar os perigos
ambientais que sero submetidos nas primeiras horas e dias de sua
vida. Os recm-nascidos saem do ambiente estril do tero para
entrar em um mundo repleto de bactrias, vrus e outros
microrganismos. Em contato com o meio Em condies
normais, o sistema imunolgico do beb no precisa ser
fortalecido, j que est programado para se desenvolver no tempo de
forma adequada. Isso sim, para que as defesas amaduream
corretamente  necessria a interao com os patgenos habituais
do meio em que vive o pequeno. Como o conseguimos? Em
primeiro lugar, no se deve descuidar de nenhuma forma, a
administrao das vacinas no momento estabelecido pelas autoridades
sanitrias no calendrio de vacinao infantil. Alm disso,
devemos alcanar um equilbrio entre uma higiene correta, de forma
que nossos filhos no estejam expostos a infeces graves, e algum
contato com os micrbios e doenas mais comuns. No se trata de
no tomar banho  criana, em duas semanas, ou consentir que se
meta em qualquer coisa na boca, mas  aconselhvel deixar um pouco
de liberdade na hora de brincar com objetos, engatinhar pelo cho ou
jogar com os animais de casa, se as temos e esto corretamente
vacunadas. Entre as crianas de todos os pases desenvolvidos tm
vindo a aumentar nos ltimos anos, as doenas alrgicas, que no
so mais do que uma resposta inadequada do organismo a substncias
que, geralmente, no apresentam perigo. Uma das teorias sobre
o aumento das doenas alrgicas  que uma maior higiene nas casas
e em geral (ou seja, menor exposio a germes) fez com que diminua
a taxa de doenas infecciosas, algo muito bom a priori, mas que
tambm faz com que o sistema imune entre em um estado que poderamos
chamar de "stand by". E, ao final, o perigo reside no fato
de que um sistema imunolgico que est programado para estar sempre
alerta termina produzindo uma resposta no adequada frente a
estmulos que realmente no so perigosas para o organismo. Outro
cuidado importante  no administrar antibiticos a criana sem a
prescrio de um pediatra e faz-lo em quantidades e durante o
tempo que este recomende, para evitar que o beb desenvolva
resistncia a estes medicamentos. E,  claro, no  de mais
dizer, no se deve fumar nunca na frente de um beb. O papel
da amamentao Durante o primeiro ano de vida, as defesas do
beb no esto completamente desenvolvidas e dependem de que sua
me lhe aconteceu durante o ltimo trimestre de gestao e as que
lhe transmite atravs do leite. Os problemas de causa imunolgica
(alergias, asma, doenas intestinais) so menos frequentes ou
aparecem mais tarde em crianas alimentadas com leite materno,
especialmente durante os primeiros trs ou quatro meses de vida. Foi
demonstrado que o leite materno protege as crianas contra infeces
agudas gastrointestinais e respiratrias, devido em grande parte 
grande quantidade de fatores imunolgicos, tanto especficos e no
especficos que contm, assim como as substncias protetoras no
imunolgicas que proporciona. O colostro (leite dos primeiros
dias), contm grande quantidade de protenas, vitaminas e
imunoglobulinas (defesas) que protegem o recm-nascido contra muitas
infeces como diarria, otite, infeces respiratrias
(resfriados, bronquiolite, bronquite, pneumonia), etc. Proteja
seu filho do estresse Muitos estudos apontam o estresse e a
insegurana emocional com uma resposta imunolgica deficiente. Um
dos mais conhecidos  o publicado na prestigiada revista Nature
Reviews Imunologia em 2005. Por isso, parece razovel proporcionar
ao beb um ambiente estvel, respeitar suas rotinas dirias e
transmitir todo o amor do mundo atravs de nossa ateno, a voz e
o contato fsico (mimos, carcias, massagens...). Um quarto
pintado com cores pastel, sem rudos estridentes, com uma luz
agradvel e bem ventilado, ou seja, um ambiente fsico agradvel e
longe do estresse, tambm contribui para o seu bem-estar. 1. Amamentao, um impulso s suas defesas Por que funciona. O leite materno est
repleta de substncias que reforam a imunidade. Os bebs
alimentados de naturalmente tm menos chances de desenvolver
certas doenas (infeces, alergias). O que diz a cincia.
Apenas nos quatro primeiros dias de amamentao do recm-nascido
recebe 4 bilhes de glbulos brancos. Tambm obtm linfcitos,
que ajudam o sistema imunolgico trabalhe, bem como IgA, um
anticorpo que reveste as vias respiratrias e o intestino e forma
uma barreira contra as bactrias. O recm-nascido produz apenas
pequenas quantidades de IgA e atinge os nveis do adulto, na saliva,
s depois de um ano de idade. O leite materno possui anticorpos,
principalmente, do tipo IgA e, em menor proporo anticorpos IgG e
IgM. O que fazer. De acordo com a Organizao Mundial da
Sade (OMS), a Associao Espanhola de Pediatria recomenda
alimentar os bebs com leite materno at os seis meses e,
posteriormente, continuar dando o peito, combinado com outros
alimentos at os dois anos de idade ou mais. 2. A importncia
da comida saudvel Por que funciona. O beb
precisa de vitaminas e minerais para que seu sistema imunolgico (e
todo o seu organismo) se fortalea. Mas o nosso corpo no pode
gerar a maioria dos nutrientes, o que temos que receb-los dos
alimentos que comemos. O que diz a cincia. Uma vez que se
introduzem outros alimentos na dieta da criana, a dieta deve ser
equilibrada e conter batatas e cenoura, que levam vitamina A; kiwi e
citrinos para a vitamina C, espinafre, que fornece vitamina E e
cereais integrais como aveia e cevada porque trazem diversos
minerais, entre os quais se destacam, sobretudo, o ferro, o zinco, o
selnio e cobre. O que fazer. Falar com o mdico sobre as
necessidades particulares de alimentao e sobre como e quando se
podem comear com a introduo dos slidos. Uma criana que
segue uma dieta saudvel, no precisa de suplementos
vitamnicos. 3. O descanso de seu filho aumenta sua defesas Por que funciona. Fornece uma
valiosa oportunidade para o corpo do beb para reparar problemas e
revitalizar-se, o que reduz a quantidade de esforo de seu
crescente, mas ainda delicado, sistema imunolgico. O que diz
a cincia. Se o beb no est mais relaxado o suficiente ir
produzir mais hormnios do estresse, o que pode retardar ou
prejudicar tanto a sua cura, o seu crescimento. Tambm pode ter
menos energia e menos vontade de fazer exerccio. O que
fazer.  importante que voc durma o suficiente: entre 16 e 20
horas, os recm-nascidos e entre 14 e 15 horas os bebs de seis a
doze meses, incluindo cochilos. Se algo interfere em sua capacidade
para conciliar o sono ou dormir seguido, o melhor  consultar o
pediatra. Mantenha seu carrinho de bebe protegido com uma capa protetora, recomendo a Wallababie que tem um material muito bom, isso ajuda ainda mais no seu descanso. 4. O exerccio  fundamental para aumentar
suas defesas Por que funciona. O exerccio fsico regular
melhora a circulao, a digesto e o apetite do beb, o que
aumenta a sua capacidade de alimentar-se convenientemente. Alm
disso, ajuda a dormir melhor, e o repouso  fundamental para o
correto funcionamento do organismo. O que diz a cincia. A
circulao melhorada ajuda a linfa (um lquido que contm muitas
clulas que combatem as infeces) a fazer seu trajeto pelo corpo.
A atividade fsica diminui a produo de hormnios do estresse,
que podem danificar o sistema imunolgico. O que fazer.
Quando o beb possa se mover, devemos nos certificar de que dedica
pelo menos meia hora por dia para fazer algum tipo de atividade
fsica. No tem por que ser exaustivo, pode ser to simples e
divertido como dar cambalhotas sobre uma manta ou rastejando atrs
de uma bola. A natao  muito bom, mas teria que esperar at os
trs ou quatro meses de vida do beb para lev-lo a uma associao
que rena as condies necessrias para essas idades. Postado por Latesha Cheatum s 11:53 Nenhum comentrio: Enviar por e-mail BlogThis! Compartilhar no Twitter Compartilhar no Facebook Compartilhar com o Pinterest quarta-feira, 4 de abril de 2018 Guia De Compras Guia De Compras Se voc est pensando em equipar o seu ginsio em casa com um aparelho cardio funcional e alternativas para as passadeiras elpticas, o remo  a sua soluo. Embora, talvez, por desconhecimento, falta de informao, voc se sente um pouco desorientada na hora de decidir que tipo de remo  o melhor para ti. Por isso, a partir de GymCompany , apresentamos a guia definitivo para comprar um remo com garantias de sucesso. O que  uma mquina de Remo? O remo  um equipamento de tamanho mdio para um intensivo treinamento cardiovascular e de baixo impacto No requer de motor porque quando voc criar a sua prpria resistncia ao remar. Assim, quanto mais energia apliques, mais rgido ser o treinamento. De fato, o funcionamento das mquinas de remo indoor  muito parecido com a resistncia que geram as bicicletas elpticas, porque ambas as mquinas funcionam sem motor. Alm disso, como com o resto de mquinas de cardio, no remo hidrulico tambm permite graduar o nvel de resistncia para adaptar a mquina s suas necessidades. O que devo classificar para comprar um remo ? Quando se dirija at a loja para adquirir o seu primeiro remo deve certificar-se de uma srie de coisas para garantir o sucesso da compra. Acima de tudo, presta ateno: Postura e selim: Tm de ser confortveis, j que, no remo, se envolvem muitos msculos e  muito importante que o movimento seja o mais adequado. Caso contrrio, podem sofrer leses Construo: Slida e resistente. Isso depende da qualidade dos materiais e do tipo de fabricante Opes de ajuste: As medidas do remo hidrulico  regulam a partir do selim. Se voc pode ajustar, ento ser vlido par qualquer usurio Resistncia: Ajustvel e bem equilibrada. O movimento deve ser suave e fluido Garantia: Uma boa garantia e servio ps-venda. Console:  Cada vez mais comum encontrar em remos uma consola integrada oferecendo todo tipo de informao. A partir velocidade, tempo decorrido, frequncia cardaca, distncia, etc. Tipos de remos de acordo com resistncia Existem trs tipos principais de mquinas de remo , que variam de acordo com seus sistemas de resistncia: Resistncia ao ar Os remos com resistncia do ar so os mais comuns nos ginsios e centros de fitness. Esta tipologia de remos funcionam com um volante de inerciaal que quanto mais fora voc apliques na fase de propulso (quando estamos puxando), mais resistncia gerada pela mquina. Uma das grandes vantagens dos remos de resistncia do ar  que so leves e fceis de transportar. Assim, so ideais para ter em casa. No obstante, tambm tem desvantagens: so equipamentos que fazem muito rudo e apenas encontrar resistncia no norte de iniciao. Resistncia hidrulica Os remos de resistncia hidrulica no so to populares como os de ar. O sistema  semelhante ao do remo de ar, simplesmente, neste caso, a resistncia  feito atravs de um tanque de gua. Dentro do tanque h umas ps que se pem cada vez que se tira do remo. Quanto maior  a quantidade de gua mais resistncia oferece. O melhor de tudo  que a experincia de remado  muito semelhante  realidade. Alm disso, a resistncia  a mesma nas duas fases do norte. O mais positivo deste tipo de remos  que existe a possibilidade de ajustar a resistncia, j que no  funo de fora ao puxar. Alm disso, so umas mquinas muito silenciosos e permitem um movimento suave. Resistncia magntica O melhor destes remos,  que a resistncia pode ser regulada de acordo com as necessidades do usurio. Alm disso, no requerem apenas manuteno porque a resistncia dos ms  restaurado a cada vez que ligar a mquina. Benefcios dos remos Quando decidir melhorar a sua sade, a primeira coisa que te vem  cabea  treinar em uma academia e, em seguida, voc parece montado para a passadeira, elptica uma bicicleta de ciclo indoor. Mas, com certeza, que no se veio a cabea as mquinas de remo. A mquina de remo,  um equipamento de fitness que se deve ter em conta, j que tem muitos benefcios para a sua sade: melhore a sua postura e a sua mobilidade, ao mesmo tempo em que se exercita, praticamente, todos os grupos musculares do corpo. , acima de tudo, muito prtico para aquecer antes de fazer outro tipo de treinamento e, como qualquer outro exerccio de cardio, para ganhar capacidade aerbica. 1. Perder peso O remo ajuda a queimar calorias de forma muito rpida. Ento, se um de seus objetivos fitness  perder peso, o remo ser um grande aliado em sua rotina. Uma pessoa de 83kg de peso, pode chegar a perder quase 400 calorias treinando cerca de 30 minutos em uma mquina de remo usando Colastrina frmula . O exerccio regular nesta mquina fitness ir ajud-lo a reduzir as calorias, uma parte muito importante na hora de perder peso. 2. Benefcios cardiovaculares O remo  um exerccio de resistncia que aumenta a funo do corao e utiliza os carboidratos para fornecer a energia necessria para fazer exerccio. Como exerccio aerbico conseguir melhorar o sistema respiratrio, o corao e a circulao. Alm disso,  a pedra angular de uma rotina de exerccio efetivo. 3. Reduz o stress  uma boa maneira de aliviar tenses e acabar com o estresse. A atividade fsica estimula os centros de prazer no crebro. Os exerccios cardiovasculares, em especial ,aumentam a quantidade de endorfinas liberadas no corpo associados com Blue caps funciona , o que pode reduzir o estresse e at mesmo reduzir os sentimentos de depresso. Outros benefcios Muito baixo impacto nas articulaes Uma vez que domine a tcnica, o movimento  fluido e as leses so muito pouco provveis. Voc gera sua prpria resistncia, de forma que quanto mais energia voc colocar no treino, maior  a resistncia gerada. Compatibilidade de freqncia cardaca significa que voc pode controlar o seu desempenho e ajustar o ritmo, seja para melhora de forma para queima de calorias. Postado por Latesha Cheatum s 05:54 Nenhum comentrio: Enviar por e-mail BlogThis! Compartilhar no Twitter Compartilhar no Facebook Compartilhar com o Pinterest segunda-feira, 2 de abril de 2018 Os 5 Erros Mais Comuns Ao Fazer Musculao Os 5 Erros Mais Comuns Ao Fazer Musculao Apesar de que voc j  um especialista no ginsio e que passe o dia na sala de musculao bombeando msculo, ainda pode ser que voc esteja cometendo alguns erros durante seus treinos. No deixe que esses erros sabotm seus ganhos durante mais tempo. Erro 1: foco na elevao, e no no movimento descendente. Fazer muitas repeties a grande velocidade, pode fazer voc se sentir como o mais forte do ginsio, mas se voc se concentrar na fase de descida do movimento, voc pode obter maiores e melhores benefcios. Ao diminuir a velocidade deste movimento elimina a elasticidade natural dos msculos e dos tecidos conjuntivos, por que o peso  exercer mais resistncia e por mais tempo. Esta tcnica promove o crescimento muscular e aumenta a fora, j que no se baseia no impulso da gravidade para poder ser executado, e sim a prpria fora O declnio lento e controlado faz com que o exerccio seja mais difcil, por isso que o mais provvel  que se tenha que reduzir a carga durante um tempo a executar uma verso do exerccio em que o movimento possa ser executado corretamente com maior facilidade se querem aproveitar os benefcios deste tipo de treinamento a longo prazo. Nosso conselho: Toma de 4 segundos para abaixar o peso, faa uma pausa durante 2 segundos na parte inferior, leva 2 segundos para levantar o peso, e faz uma pausa durante 2 segundos na parte superior. Faa este exerccio. ERRO 2: Limitar-se a fazer os seus exerccios favoritos. A estas alturas, certamente voc tem uma rotina definida, que usa habitualmente, j sabe que os exerccios se do bem e que te funcionam melhor em cada grupo muscular. No obstante, estes exerccios certamente se esto firmes e limitando. Se quiser trabalhar todos os grupos musculares, voc tem que sustentar os seus pontos fracos, corrigir seus maus hbitos e desafiar seu corpo, recorrendo a aqueles movimentos exerccios que te so mais difceis de executar. Voc tem que certificar-se de que estar trabalhando os movimentos fundamentais, especialmente e testar aqueles que impliquem uma amplitude e mobilidade particular em segundo lugar. Nosso conselho: Inclui em sua rotina de exerccios que envolvam movimentos bsicos do corpo humano, como a trao, o impulso, o curl e o agachamento e coloca como concretiz-los e rev-los em cada treino. Escolha exerccios que atendam a esses padres, e voc ter uma rotina de todo o corpo eficaz para aumentar seus ganhos sem esquecer movimentos fundamentais e preparndote para superar os exerccios que antes representavam um desafio. ERRO 3: Realizar os exerccios em uma nica posio. Voc certamente sabe que a adio de peso h um exerccio mais difcil. No obstante, se o que pretende  fazer com que o seu corpo realmente trabalhe mais duro desde a cabea at os ps, voc deve mudar a sua postura ao realizar um mesmo exerccio. Nem sempre voc tem que estar com os ps na mesma distncia dos ombros e olhando para a frente. A alterao da forma de colocar os ps sobre o cho, e, portanto, ativar os msculos estabilizadores da ao, faz com que aumente o desafio do movimento do exerccio. Trabalhar estes msculos voc fortalece o core do corpo, melhorias na estabilidade, e ganha fora em outros msculos do corpo, fato que ir ajud-lo a mover cargas mais pesadas com o tempo. Nosso conselho: Comece em uma posio escalonada, com o p esquerdo na frente do direito. Agora, mova o p direito a um par de centmetros para a esquerda. Seus ps devem formar uma linha reta que passe por baixo de seu corpo. Quer que seja ainda mais difcil? Comea em uma postura dividida em linha, e ento desa o corpo em uma estocada para que o seu joelho de trs cierna sobre o cho. ERRO 4: Pular o aquecimento. Um aquecimento adequado pode transformar o seu treino. O aquecimento melhora a amplitude de movimento, aumenta a estabilidade articular, reduz o risco de leses e melhora a comunicao entre a sua mente e os seus msculos. Se voc adicionar um aquecimento  sua rotina durante duas semanas consecutivas, logo voc vai perceber que a parte mais importante do treinamento era que uma vez que voc estava evitando. Nosso conselho : Completa um aquecimento de cerca de 10 minutos antes da sesso de exerccios, realizando alongamentos em primeiro lugar, a abertura de movimentos e alguns exerccios de intensidade baixa e que eles possam comear a ativar o ritmo cardaco. ERRO 5: Esquecer-se da posio de costas. Quanto mais confortvel voc se sente na sala de musculao,  mais fcil cair em um ritmo e uma rotina e esquecer-se de alguns detalhes do treinamento. Uma parte do treinamento, que no deveria passar por alto o fato de reforar o Core e manter uma postura correta. Deve-Se assegurar que a coluna vertebral est em seu alinhamento neutro, o que reduz o risco de leses graves nas costas. J seja que voc est pegando um peso do cho em tentar superar-se no treino, costas deve permanecer sempre plana, com o abdmen concentrado: deve-se estabilizar o corpo cada vez que se tenha um peso em sua mo, sem flexionar estender as costas. Nosso conselho:: Sopra fortemente e aperta os msculos abdominais, como se estivesse a ponto de ser atingido no estmago. Mantenha essa contrao durante todo o exerccio, ao realizar todos os movimentos. Repe esta postura antes de cada repetio. Postado por Latesha Cheatum s 05:40 Nenhum comentrio: Enviar por e-mail BlogThis! Compartilhar no Twitter Compartilhar no Facebook Compartilhar com o Pinterest sexta-feira, 30 de maro de 2018 Evo Como Protena De Rpida Ou Lenta Assimilao? Evo Como Protena De Rpida Ou Lenta Assimilao? Hoje em dia, o leque de produtos relacionados com a suplementao de protena em p  muito amplo, e h uma grande quantidade de modelos e tipos, o que nos torna realmente difcil a tarefa de escolher um determinado. Lembre-se que a protena  o macronutriente principal que possui benefcios para o ganho de massa muscular, manuteno bem a reduo de gordura.  necessrio obter um mnimo de protenas em funo de nossa condio fsica, e de acordo com a atividade que se realize. Obviamente, os requisitos de indivduos ativos superam amplamente os sedentrios, e, portanto, haver que garantir a ingesto de protenas de alto valor biolgico. O valor biolgico  uma medida de aproveitamento que nos permitir utilizar os aminocidos, que formam a protena, para levar a cabo os inmeros processos fisiolgicos, tanto para a sntese proteica, bem como para a produo de hormnios, enzimas... Em primeiro lugar, o mais importante  saber exatamente que tipos de protena disponveis no mercado, baseada em uma caracterstica em particular: a velocidade de absoro Tipos de Protena Dentro da gama de produtos proteicos podemos dividir a protena em dois grupos: Protena de rpida assimilao de quitoplan composio , ou seja, possuem algumas caractersticas que lhe conferem uma rpida digesto e posterior assimilao Protena de libertao gradual, seriam contrrio das anteriores, podendo encontrar protenas que necessitam de maior tempo de digesto, bem, so formadas por diferentes protenas com ndices de absoro diferentes, obtendo um produto de liberao multifsico" Quando precisamos de uma protena de rpida lenta assimilao? Tal como o nome indicam, segundo sejam as nossas necessidades com relao ao momento em que a ingesto de protenas  requerida, nos decantaremos por um tipo ou outro. A protena de rpida absoro  recomendada para momentos tais como: Recm-levantado Antes de entrenar Depois de treinar A protena de libertao gradual,  aquela que nos abastece de nutrientes durante um perodo maior de tempo, no qual no vamos ingerir alimento, e poderamos citar: Antes de dormir Entre as refeies, se eles vo passar um determinado nmero de horas Dentro das opes de protena de liberao lenta, encontra-se a casena micelar , tal como a que encontramos no produto Evocasein Maxberry .  uma protena altamente recomendado para se tomar prevemos um longo perodo sem realizar ingesto de alimento, pouco antes de ir dormir, e que, claro, renda dentro das nossas necessidades dirias. Visto, ento, o motivo pelo qual podemos adquirir uma ou outra protena baseada em como nos pode facilitar a tomada de protena em funo do tempo, passamos a analisar, dentro da gama de protenas de rpida assimilao, que tipos existem. Neste caso, vamos nos referir a protena cuja origem  o soro de leite, whey protein (ns recomendamos a loja HSNstore , onde voc pode encontrar uma ampla variedade), dado que  uma das que maior ndice de introduo tem no mercado, mas tambm existem de outras fontes, como carne, ovo, do tipo vegetariano/vegano, como as de soja, ervilha arroz. Concentrado de protena de soro de leite Esta protena  obtida a partir do soro do leite (o leite  composto de 80% de casena protena lenta" e soro protena rpida"). Sua concentrao de frao protica geralmente cerca de 70% no produto pronto para o consumo final. Costuma conter alguns traos de gordura e lactose. Para quem  dirigido? Esta protena  recomendada para pessoas que esto comeando seus treinos e desejam incorporar uma fonte de protena como suplemento. Do mesmo modo, pode ser uma excelente opo para usurios mais avanados, como o mtodo de cumprir com as necessidades dirias de protenas. Um produto muito bom,  Evowhey Protein da HSN Sports , o qual se trata de uma protena do tipo Concentrado disponvel em uma imensa quantidade de sabores, e que tem uma grande aceitao. Mantm um excelente textura,  de fcil dissoluo, e alm disso,  ideal at mesmo como ingrediente de receitas, tal como panquecas, waffles, muffins, misturado com outras fontes, como queijo fresco, iogurte, aumentando assim o valor protico. Isolado de protena de soro de leite Este tipo de protena obedece  que se obtm depois de experimentar certos processos nos quais se isola", ou seja, voc vai microfiltrando (aqui existem vrias tcnicas), eliminando a lactose, gorduras e hidratos de carbono, e conseguindo uma protena mais pura. Os Isolados de protena de soro de leite oferecem em torno de 85-90% de protena no produto final. Um bom exemplo de pureza deste tipo de protena seria: Whey Protein Isolate 92% (voc pode encontr-la na seo de isolados de soro de HSNstore ), obtida pelo CFM (Microfiltrao por Fluxo Cruzado", o qual  um procedimento que garante a manuteno das fraces proteicas que guardam relao com benefcios para a nossa sade, como melhorar o sistema imunolgico. Para quem  dirigido? O Isolado de protena de soro de leite seria a protena recomendada para pessoas que sofram de alguma intolerncia  lactose. Alm disso, pelo seu alto contedo de protena, seria uma opo muito boa para as dietas de baixa caloria, nas quais se promove a perda de gordura. No obstante, tambm  claro, uma excelente deciso como fonte de protena para tomar como complemento a nossa nutrio. Hidrolisado de protena Hidrolisar protenas significa dividir" a estrutura molecular da mesma, obtendo unidades mais pequenas, e, portanto, mais absorvveis. Estas unidades a que nos referimos se tratam os aminocidos, que formam as protenas. O processo de digesto de protena leva a digerirla, e obter aminocidos. Neste sentido, sobre um hidrolisado de protena da colastrina, pode-se dizer que j foi passado este processo, e vai oferecer um alto teor de peptdeos (as ligaes entre aminocidos que  a forma em que realmente absorve o nosso corpo a protena). Um hidrolisado de protena  o tipo de protena mais rpido para que os aminocidos podem estar disponveis na corrente sangunea. Para quem  dirigido? O hidrolisado de protena  uma protena recomendada para pessoas que procuram um produto de eficincia, dado que mantenha um elevado ritmo de treino, aplicando alta intensidade e alta freqncia, e se vejam obrigados a otimizar a sua recuperao, alm de influenciar o processo de ganho muscular. O hidrolisado de protena est pensado para ser o shake ps-treino perfeito. Evohydro de HSN , ser plena garantia de oferecer um hidrolisado obtido a partir do Isolado de protena, mantendo suas propriedades, e, claro, serve para as pessoas intolerantes  lactose. Compartilhar no Twitter Compartilhar no Facebook Compartilhar com o Pinterest Consegue Seus Objetivos De Treino Consegue Seus Objetivos De Treino Se o que procura  correr mais rpido, queimar mais gordura, aumentar a resistncia, construir mais massa muscular simplesmente ganhar mais flexibilidade, voc precisa de um plano. A seguir apresentamos os 10 objetivos mais comuns, e ajud-lo a obt-lo a partir de uma srie de tcnicas e planejamento de rotinas. Ento continue lendo se voc quer aprender a levar o seu treino para o prximo nvel. 1 - Queimar mais gordura Conseguir queimar mais gordura requer uma queima geral de calorias. Os exerccios cardiovasculares, que so executados durante tempos prolongados e de longas distncias so os que contribuem para queimar um maior percentual de calorias de gordura, mas aumentando apenas um pouco a intensidade, consegue-se aumentar a queima de calorias e gorduras totais, e a nvel geral. O treinamento por intervalos de queima de uma quantidade maior de calorias devido ao efeito ps-combusto", conhecido como Excesso de Consumo de Oxignio Ps-Exerccio (EPOC). Ir continuar queimando calorias durante horas depois de seu treinamento, at que o corpo volte ao estado de pr-treino. Tenta ir alternando sprints de 20 a 30 segundos por cada 5 minutos de corrida em ritmo normal. 2 - Correr mais rpido A luta por uma nova melhor marca pessoal por ganhar um amigo na prxima 10K exigem exerccios para melhorar o comprimento da passada (distncia que se consegue com cada passo) e a freqncia de passada (como se movem rpido as pernas). Isso  porque, em ltima instncia, a velocidade de corrida baseia-se na multiplicao do comprimento da passada por sua freqncia, o que implica aumentar a fora e o poder dos extensores de quadril, especialmente os glteos e isquiotibiais. Por isso, recomenda-se a incorporao de agachamento, step-ups e as flexes blgaras de uma perna (a perna para trs elevada em um banco que ajuda a melhorar o comprimento da passada), durante os treinos, assim como tambm os movimentos que fortalecem a panturrilha. 3 - Levantar mais peso Ganhar mais fora requer duas coisas: ir alm de sua zona de conforto e usar o peso que lhe fadiga no mais de seis repeties. Vrios estudos mostram que obter os melhores resultados utilizando 2-6 sries de seis repeties e perodos de 2-5 minutos de descanso entre cada srie. O descanso entre as sries, permite poder voltar a repetir o exerccio, na seguinte srie. Se voc quer se concentrar em seu desempenho quando trabalha as costas e no pode realizar, pelo menos, quatro cinco dominadas, recomenda-se faz-los em um ngulo de uma mquina Smith em outra barra reta testando pulldowns em uma mquina de cabo. 4 - Aumentar a resistncia Se voc pretende sobreviver aos seus adversrios no campo de jogo em uma corrida de corrida, precisa fortalecer seu corao, aumentar sua capacidade de absoro de oxignio nos msculos e lidar com os subprodutos do exerccio, como o cido lctico. Voc pode usar um combinado de longa e curta distncia e treinamento com intervalos de alta intensidade (HIIT). Isso inclui 5-6 dias de longas distncias lentas que tambm compreendem trs dias de intervalo. Trata de obter 30-40 segundos de sprints a toda potncia combinados com 3-4 minutos, a um ritmo mais lento. HIIT ajuda a fortalecer o corao e favorece uma maior absoro de oxignio no msculo a trabalhar.  importante beber lquidos com este exerccio, porque quanto mais hidratado voc estiver, menor a chance de sofrer um empurro cibras durante o exerccio. 5 - Melhorar a agilidade A agilidade  muito til para evitar poas em um dia chuvoso um buraco na calada ao caminhar correr. Assim, a agilidade  a capacidade de iniciar, parar e mudar de direo de maneira eficiente, e, por isso, so recomendados trs exerccios para melhorar: exerccios de escada, corrida de obstculos exerccios de cones. Para os exerccios de escadas de agilidade, voc pode constru-lo voc mesmo com tiras de papel comprar um em uma loja de desporto. So colocados os marcadores (canetas, blocos de papel...) no cho ao longo de 9 metros e separados entre si 46 cm. Comea com os dois ps na primeira caixa e pule para as duas seguintes, com os ps juntos. Depois salta aterrissando com os dois ps fora da prxima caixa. Continua pulando com os dois ps fazendo duas caixas dentro e dois fora. 6 - Aumentar a potncia Aumentar a potncia permite mover um objeto levantar um peso mais rpido do que faria. A potncia pode ser aumentada incorporando exerccios pliomtricos na sua rotina, mas estes movimentos explosivos necessitam de uma base slida e no so aconselhveis para iniciantes. Comea com treinos de 5-10 segundos e v progredindo. Para comear com esses saltos no agachamento ponte de p com as pernas afastadas e as mos entrelaadas atrs da cabea. Mantenha o seu peso sobre os calcanhares, e pe-se de ccoras, at que suas coxas estejam paralelas ao cho e permanece nesta posio. Sem fazer nenhum movimento contrrio e sem usar seus braos, salta to alto quanto lhe seja possvel. Ao pousar, certifique-se de absorver o impacto empurrando os quadris para trs e flexionando os joelhos. 7 - aumenta a flexibilidade O aumento da flexibilidade consiste em realizar alongamentos estticos, passivos, PFN e dinmicos. O alongamento esttico envolve alongar um msculo e mant-lo durante 30 segundos assim, com o qual, se concentra em um msculo especfico. O alongamento passivo requer o uso de uma cinta, a gravidade, o peso corporal ou outra pessoa para aplicar a fora enquanto descontrai. Os alongamentos de PNF (Facilitao neuromuscular Propioceptiva) implicam um mtodo de relaxamento e contrao normalmente utilizado por atletas. Os alongamentos dinmicos incluem muitos msculos e as articulaes e oferecem a melhor unio entre exerccio e esporte.  recomendvel que voc faa 2-3 sries de 20. Utiliza alongamentos leves antes do exerccio (e depois de um aquecimento) e realiza outros mais intensos aps o mesmo. 8 - Melhorar o equilbrio Equilbrio implica em algo mais do que a capacidade de atravessar uma barra de equilbrio sem cair, j que integra a fora, a mobilidade, a flexibilidade dinmica e a estabilidade do core. Por conseguinte, melhorar o equilbrio implica fortalecer os ps e a parte inferior da perna com exerccios como levantamento de panturrilha. Trata de manter o equilbrio sobre um p e v progredindo parando sobre um p em uma superfcie instvel, como um tapete de yoga enrolada uma almofada de equilbrio. Mais tarde voc pode fazer o mesmo com os olhos fechados para remover um feedback visual e aumentar o desafio. 9 - Prepare a fora do core A fora do core intervm em todos os esportes e atividades, evite leses e mantm o abdmen em forma. Voc pode comear a trabalh-la com um exerccio isomtrico simples como a prensa. Comea com a prancha, e depois segue com a prancha lateral e elevao de quadril; mantendo cada posio de 30 a 60 segundos. Se a prancha tradicional,  muito difcil comear apoiando os joelhos. Voc tambm pode aumentar o desafio, levantando um p do cho. SAHAS envisages an inclusive and a just world, where each individual lives with dignity, respect and equality. The mission of the organization is to assist in the empowerment of disadvantaged and marginalised groups for gaining control over their own health and development issues, restoring rights and improving the quality of their lives. projects.text: html Water.org - Water Charity For Safe Water & Sanitation Water.org  Contact Us About Us About Us About Us Overview Founders, Board & Team News & Press Financials Our Solutions Our Solutions Overview WaterCredit WaterEquity New Ventures Global Engagement Make an Impact Ways to Donate Start a Fundraiser Shop to Support Cause Marketing Resources Resources FAQs Our Impact Where We Work Africa Ethiopia Ghana Kenya Tanzania Uganda Asia Bangladesh Cambodia India Indonesia Philippines Latin America Brazil Honduras Peru Our Impact Stories The Water Crisis Our Partners Donate Opportunity starts with safe water Water.org has empowered 17 millionpeople with access to safe water and sanitation through affordable financing. Donate Buy now There's a smart way to end the water crisis Millions of people around the world could get access to safe water in their homes with the help of small, affordable loans. That's where Water.org comes in. We are here to bring safe water and sanitation to the world through access to small, affordable loans. There is both a need and demand for these loans, because when people have access to safe water, they get time back to go to school, earn an income and take care of their family. It changes their world. For more than 25 years, with your help, we've been providing families with hope, health and the opportunity to break the cycle of poverty. Learn how we empower families Your donation is a powerful catalyst One of the major barriers to safe water and sanitation is affordable financing. We address this barrier head-on through access to small, easily repayable loans. Every repaid loan creates a new opportunity for another family. By supporting Water.org, you are part of a solution that reaches more people, faster. Together with our 92 partners around the world, we've attracted more than $1 billion in capital to support small loans that bring access to safe water and sanitation to millions of people in need. Thats how every $1 we put into WaterCredit creates $47 worth of impact. And thats how we make your donation go further. Donate now and multiply your impact Meet Aisyah Aisyah is a wife, a mother, and a farmer from Indonesia. Time is critical to all of her roles. Without safe water at home, Aisyah woke up before sunrise to collect water before working in her rice fields. Thanks to Water.org, Aisyah got access to a small, affordable loan that would allow her to take charge of her own water and sanitation needs through a water tap at home. Empowered with access to safe water at home, Aisyah changed her world. For Aisyah, less time getting water means more time for work. That's the power of water. Meet the people you impact 200 M women and girls spend 200 million hours each day collecting water Our founders: Matt Damon and Gary White Ten years ago, Matt and Gary were independently working to break down barriers between people and access to safe water. A common goal to pioneer smart solutions to the water crisis brought them together, and their combined water and sanitation expertise and star-power have allowed Water.org to emerge as a leader in the water and sanitation sector. Meet our team Highest rankings from charity watch dogs For more than ten years, Charity Navigator has consistently rated Water.org in the top 10% of global charities for transparency and financial accountability. Review our financials Partnering to solve the water crisis We are proud to partner with some of the most respected foundations, biggest brands, and quality implementing partners in the world who share our passion and commitment to solving the water crisis. Learn about our partners Other ways to help Whether you are an individual or a company, we have opportunities for you to make an impact. You can start an online fundraiser or create a cause marketing program for your business. Get involved Add impact to your inbox Get our email updates about our work and the people we empower. First Name: Last Name: Email: You can help us put the power of water into the hands of millions of people. projects.name: Social Participative Research Assoc.TALLER DE VIDA
projects.text: html Taller de Vida | Centro de Desarrollo Psicosocial DONA Inicio Nosotros Quines Somos Nuestra Historia Programas Publicaciones Contctanos Inicio Nosotros Quines Somos Nuestra Historia Programas Publicaciones Contctanos Taller de Vida | Centro de Desarrollo Psicosocial 14869 home,page-template,page-template-full_width,page-template-full_width-php,page,page-id-14869,wls_unknown,ajax_fade,page_not_loaded,,qode-title-hidden,qode-theme-ver-16.8,qode-theme-bridge,qode_header_in_grid,wpb-js-composer js-comp-ver-5.4.7,vc_responsive Todos los nios cuentan Unidos para trasformar el impacto de la violencia sociopoltica y aportar a una cultura de paz Todos los nios cuentan Unidos para trasformar el impacto de la violencia sociopoltica y aportar a una cultura de paz / 2 / 2 Nosotros un grupo de mujeres profesionales y lderes comunitarias enfrentadas a la violencia socio poltica en diferentes zonas del pas, decidimos aportar a la transformacin de su impacto en la vida de nios, nias, mujeres, familias y comunidades que afrontaban la situacin de desplazamiento forzado, la desaparicin y la vinculacin al conflicto armado, conformando El Centro de desarrollo y Consultora Psicosocial -Taller de Vida-. LEER MS Lo que Hacemos Durante los aos transcurridos nos hemos enfrentado a distintos retos que nos han llevado a generar programas, estrategias y acciones que impacten positivamente en las poblaciones comunidades y territorios con los que trabajamos e interactuamos y co-construimos. LEER MS Nuestra historia Iniciamos nuestro camino unidas a organizaciones como Terre Des Hommes- Alemania, nuestro primer reto fue el desarrollo de una propuesta de apoyo emocional enfocada en la atencin de mujeres y sus hijos en situacin de desplazamiento forzado, provenientes en especial de los departamentos de Crdoba y Meta. LEER MS Las nociones de desarrollo humano, resiliencia, insercin social y derechos humanos, aunque procedentes de marcos disciplinares diferentes se han interconectado sobre todo en los principios axiolgicos y en los valores humanos que definen y se constituyen as en el marco de referencia de nuestro hacer a medida que avanzamos afrontando retos y desafos ao tras ao. Nuestros Aliados Desde 1994 hemos contado con diversas organizaciones y plataformas nacionales e internacionales, que se identifican con nuestra apuesta misional y han aportado al desarrollo de nuestros programas y proyectos, logrando aportar al diseo, ejecucin y seguimiento, de procesos de intervencin psicosocial desde metodologas innovadoras que potencien los recursos de las personas, familias, comunidades e instituciones como centros educativos, para afrontar el impacto de la violencia socio poltica que hemos vivido en nuestro pas. Nuestros Aportantes Aportan al desarrollo de los procesos, organizaciones de cooperacin internacional, grupos organizados de la sociedad civil, empresas, donantes, que permiten la ejecucin de nuestra planeacin estratgica y el desarrollo de cada uno de los proyectos, asegurando el logro de sus resultados, el desarrollo de metodologas innovadoras y de impacto y cambios y transformaciones en cada uno de los escenarios donde interactuamos. Lo que Logramos Juntos PRESENCIA, carnaval convite por una infancia feliz Desde el 28 de octubre al 18 de noviembre nos encontraremos en Pereira, realizando el carnaval convite por una infancia feliz con nuestro programa Enraizarte. Estamos muy contentos de hacer presencia con diferentes actividades artsticas y culturales con las que pretendemos tratar diferentes problemticas tales...... 09 Junio, 2018 / No comment Un ao sin las 42 nias de Guatemala Hoy decimos No al olvido!... 09 Junio, 2018 / No comment Memoria y Solidaridad 9 de abril Da Nacional de la Memoria y Solidaridad con las Vctimas del Conflicto Armado Desde el Centro de Desarrollo y Consultora Psicosocial Taller de Vida enviamos un mensaje de esperanza al pueblo colombiano y al mundo entero, en el marco de la jornada del 9 de...... 09 Junio, 2018 / No comment ENCUNTRANOS EN: info@tallerdevida.org +571-805-31-59 Cdigo postal: 110311304 Bogota  Colombia SGUENOS EN: CONOCE NUESTRA POLTICA DE PROTECCIN DE DATOS CONTCTANOS Enviar Copyright 2018 Taller de Vida. Dr.Pradip Kumar Sarmah is a man of innovation and social inclines since his childhood. Dr.Pradip Kumar Sarmahgraduates from the College of Veterinary Science, Guwahati in 1989, worked as a Veterinary assistant Surgeon (VAS) with the Deptt. Of A.H. & Vety, Govt .of Assam. After working almost three year of time ,he had resigned his Government job in September 1991 and joined a national level funding & supporting organization namely Rashtryia Gramin Vikas Nidhi(RGVN). Yet Dr Sarmah was passionate with his own idea of doing something innovation and time worthy, that leads to share his vision and plan with a few professionals and entrepreneurs in 1994. His idea was well-supported and finally a consensus plan was emerged and culminated in forming center for Rural Development(CRD). Initially area livelihood promotion & enhancement based on local skill and resources. Later the organization got registered under the FCRA and various donor and funding agencies come forward to support CRD for bringing it mission into reality. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Rickshaw Bank Home  Rickshaw Bank Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary A ray of hope for thousand of poor and toiling human. In the technology driven world of Indians most populous city, one would have expected rickshaws to disappear with the faster growth of modern, motorized transport. Instead ,the number of rickshaw have increased amazingly in the last couple of year .In the absence of any substitute mode of transport for short distance ,the rickshaw meet the need for urban and sub-urban mobility in middle and lower middle income neighborhood; and provide a low-cost way to transport households goods and furniture. This has also the signifinces in the present day environment where we are talking about global warming and climate changes; and the cycle rickshaw becomes only the green mode of transportation by its very nature of avoiding carbon emission. It is estimated that there are 8 million rickshaw puller in India. However, hardly 10% rickshaw pullers own their rickshaw and the rest depend on the private owner on daily rental basis Rs.30 to Rs 50 vary from place to place. Neither have they had social security nor dignity at their work. The Richwak Bank of CRD has brought a hope to the rickshaw puller by providing a newly designed rickshaw, with insurances and license at an affordable cost with facilitating their solidarity for right and livelihood. The pilot phase of the Rickshaw bank was launched in Guwahati and later it was expanded to the other areas in Assam and outside Assam too. The project was started with much hype on November 20,2004,and over the six year of period ,it has emerged itself as the flagship project of CRD.As on date CRD is the only organization in the world which has exclusively focusing on different development issues of the rickshaw puller and working continually with its rickshaw bank Project. Initially the project was started with the financial support of INDIAN oil Corporation (IOC), oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC), Hindustan Lever Limited (HLL) and later on different bank and funding agencies extended their philanthropic assistances .During this financial year, Centre for rural development (CRD) pleased to have received financial assistances from Punjab National Bank (PNB), Union bank of India (UBI) and Milliped Foundation etc. Planning to Buy Rickshaw Get an instant quote from us about the Rickshaw. Cost may vary on customization. Get a quote About CRD Centre for Rural Development is a non profit organization with a concept of building better future for the people of India. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Role Of CRD Home  Social Mobilization Act Under AACP  Role Of CRD Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary CRDs role in implementing the project as a nodal agency is: To facilitate active participation and capacity building of the beneficiaries, CBOs, farmers groups and womens groups in the project activities under AACP. To create a forum for rapport building between the project staff and participating for effective and efficient participatory planning and implementation of the project activities. To help the participating GOA departments and PCU in getting feedback from the field while implementing the activities and in supporting, monitoring and evaluation system of the project. To motivate and sensitize the personal of the project implementation Agencies, participating farmers and District Administration to the grass root level issues/problems, gender issues and environmental impact of AACP activities with an emphasize on participatory approach. The AACP Project is emphasizing mainly on the following problems: Lack of Capital in farm and rural communities for productivity enhancement investments. Inadequate market-linked technology transfer. Absence of basic producer organizations linked to markets. Low productivity livestock resources. Poor rural road network limiting market access and constraining diversification away from rice to high value perishable crops. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Progress In Fishery Home  Social Mobilization Act Under AACP  Progress In Fishery Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary PROGRESS OF SECTORS UNDER AACP : FISHERY Pisciculture is recognized as the sunshine which contributes substantially to the overall agricultural economy of the country. It stimulates growth of numbers of subsidiary industries and is the source of livelihood for a large section of economically backward population, especially fishermen and other underprivileged communities. It helps in increasing food supply, generating adequate employment opportunities and raising nutritional level. It has also the huge export potential and is a big source of foreign exchange earnings for the country. However, fishery is basically a state subject and the primary responsibility for its development mainly rests with the state government. The major thrust in fisheries development has been focused on optimizing production and productivity, augmenting export of fishery products; generating employment and improving welfare of fishermen and their socio economic status. Over the years, the fisheries industry is emerging and rapidly growing. There exists several investment opportunities in the sector for the entrepreneurs and farmers. But there are several challenges and issues facing the fisheries development in Assam such as accurate data on assessment of fishery resources and their potential in terms of fish production; development of sustainable technologies, post-harvest storage & transportation, processing etc. However, fishery is having a large market in the Assam and other states in northeastern region including neighboring states West Bengal and Orissa While focusing on intensive fish production and poverty alleviation, AACP has taken different schemes for fishery development in Assam viz. Farmers Pond development, Community Tank Development and Beel Development. In each of the scheme, inclusion of poor and marginalized ones and intensification of productivity are the prime movers In the social mobilization process facilitated by CRD, beneficiaries are selected through Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA) and management groups or committees are formed as per concern of the scheme. It is noteworthy that the community groups have been involved in every step of implementation- estimating expenditure, input management, water quality management, harvesting etc. Besides, CRD has been facilitating institutional development of those common interest groups and committees for long-term sustenance through different skill development programmes like envisioning goal and articulating operational strategy, record-keeping and accounts, developing group dynamics etc. During the year 2009-2010 the fishery sector has brought a significant success. Those fish farmers earlier who did not pay attention to their asset now become aware by this project and earned profit in substantial way. It catalyzes the use of information and Communications Terchnology (ICT) for collaboration and knowledge sharing among development stakeholders  Government, NGOs and Private Sectors. Vikaspedia, emphasizing on key areas of social development, provides responsive and credible information products and services in local languages catering to the needs of under served communities. It also provides a framework for collaborative content creation and information dissemination. Vikaspedia is available in all 22 scheduled languages of India besides English. Information services related to key livelihood sectors (initially the six sectors of Agriculture, Education, Health, Social welfare, Energy and E-Governance) are currently available in the portal. The portal is also made mobile compliant, thereby enhancing the access and dissemination of information through mobiles. Centre for Rural Development is the state nodal Agency supporting Vikaspedia Assam since 2013. Our primary objective is to provide domain specific information to the local people in their own language, make them understand & create awareness, using Information Technology and get benefited for their regualr day to day support. Educating the end user on various issues in the identified six domains and enabling use of information and communication technologies as the means of information services availability/ accessibility to common man. We have covered 480 outreach activities till date, touching Various KVKs, Agriculture Universities, Departmental heads of the State & Districts in mentioned domains, Schools, Colleges, various NRCs, ICARs, Gram Panchayat, Rural Development Agency, Social Groups & covered Central government identified Aspirational districts along with other states of North East. Vikaspedia Assam is currently most viewed Assamese site across the Globe.There is no site in Assamese Language which covered wide area of development issues & uploaded more than 50,000 pages approximately in various domains Like  Agriculture, Health, Education, Social Welfare, and Power & E- Governance. Along with that we are promoting Government schemes & area specific details to support & connect each corner of the state & people as crowd sourcing site. Our content contributors are common people sharing their success stories & experience in various fields. Vikaspedia provides an opportunity to all common people to connect to the global opportunities, directly connecting government officials to understand all welfare & various people oriented policy, agriculture related queries and getting answers from the expert group, various health related issues answering by Sr. Group of Healthcare Officials . It provides power to common people asking questions in discussions forum. As a State nodal agency we are connecting to the crowd of the state & digitizing every possible corner, making people aware & taking advantage of modern digital technology. http://as.vikaspedia.in/InDG Planning to Buy Rickshaw Get an instant quote from us about the Rickshaw. Science & Technology Entrepreneurship Development (STED) Project is an ambitious initiative of the Department of Science & Technology, Government of India to bring about a socio-economic development of an area through the intervention of science & technology. It aims at inculcating strong entrepreneurial orientation in people that will result in effective utilization of resources both human and material of a region besides generating opportunities for employment and creation of wealth. One of the key focused areas of STED is to raise the socio-economic level of the economically weaker sections of the population in the region by enhancing their earning potential through self-employment. This is done through by helping them to set up micro-enterprises through a process of empowering them with technical knowledge and skills besides business related skills. As an executing agency under this prestigious project, Centre for Rural Development (CRD) has to undertake and operate the project by promoting Micro-entrepreneurs for production of Slow-moving vehicles replicating the existing Rickshaw Bank of CRD as the model enterprise, as well as for conducting Research & Design innovations of the existing slow-moving vehicles by engaging qualified professionals. CRD under the STED Project will select, train and support 80(eighty) aspiring micro-entrepreneurs in 80(eighty) Districts covering 16(sixteen) states including Assam, Bihar, Chattisgarh, Gujarat, Haryana, Jharkhand, Manipur, Madhya Pradesh, Orissa, Punjab, Rajasthan, Tamil Nadu, Tripura, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh and West Bengal, within a period of 4(four) years starting from May 2009, providing them all kinds of guidance including skill development trainings for setting up small industrial units in order to independently assemble/manufacture eco-friendly slow-moving vehicles like Cycle Rickshaw, Food Cart, Vegetable & Fruits Cart, Garbage Cart, Fish Carts, Momo Cart etc. The target group would essentially be unemployed youth who may or may not possess necessary skill to launch a micro-unit but have the necessary desire and aptitude for such venture. The operation for first year has been started in Assam, wherein 17 districts are being targeted and STED staff started their screening process of entrepreneurs and grooming their enterprises. Progress during this financial year has been: An extensive study and documentation of the working methodology of the existing Rickshaw Bank project of CRD has been accomplished on the basis of keen observation and interaction with the existing staff of the said project. Apart from technical aspect, special study had been made on the financial and social aspects of the enterprise and all its stakeholders. The outcome of these studies was a thorough analysis of the overall improvisations necessary for promotion of the Rickshaw Bank model under STED Project for creation of new Micro Entrepreneurs. Finally, a Process Manual has been prepared as the guiding and reference book for implementation of the various stages of the project. In the meantime, under the STED Project, a unique initiative for harnessing traditional wisdom and natural skills of local rural innovators has been undertaken. As part of this initiative, technical collaboration with indigenous innovators for design innovations of slow moving vehicles has been made, and within a short span time, a new design using 2(two) cranks and 2(two) Chain-systems has been developed together with a gear system, which could be effortlessly introduced in the existing models of the Rickshaw Bank for enhancing its efficiency. The Project also utilized the unique service of a British Environmental Intern named Ms Tess Joyce from Kingston University, London. She joined the STED Project team, and during July-August/2009, helped the team in collecting information regarding environmental issues as well as workers safety standards maintained at the present Rickshaw Bank workshop. It is significant that during the preparation of the environmental model, support from the Centre for Environment of Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati, had also been availed, and extensive research had been made for reference to the highest standard of environmental practices maintained all over the world in relation to micro enterprise workshops. Ultimately, the new Environmental Report became extraordinary and unique, because, here the internationally recognized EMAS standard had been adapted, while localized need and problems specific to India have also been incorporated. This environmental standard model had been already incorporated within the STED Process Manual for its practical utility. The project team has also started dissemination of project information at different townships viz. Nalbari, Morigaon, Nagaon, Goalpara. Barpeta, Darrang, Bongaigaon, Sivasagar, Jorhat, Golaghat, Diburugarh, Tinisukia in Assam through its different branch/ field level units and rapport building with different mainstream institutes viz. banks, DICC etc. STED team had also availed the opportunities of highlighting its objectives before stake-holders, other organizations involved in similar activities, as well as development agencies and scientific collaborators. Efforts were given to explore the various possibilities of technological, social and financial collaborations with other similar initiatives. The interaction with print, audio and visual media during these programmes had also enriched the profile of the project. These additional efforts of the STED team managed to create additional linkages with other NGOs and Government Agencies for future success of the Project. A model Bankable Project was also prepared in order to help the entrepreneurs for credit linkage from banks or other financial institutes. By the end of the year, a total of 11 entrepreneurs have been screened and groomed for taking up their own enterprise. Already 5 entrepreneurs in different districts viz. Morigaon, Goalpara, Baksa, Nalbari, Bongaigaon have started their enterprises. Planning to Buy Rickshaw Get an instant quote from us about the Rickshaw. Cost may vary on customization. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Progress In Agriculture Home  Social Mobilization Act Under AACP  Progress In Agriculture Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Assam is predominantly rural and the economy primarily agrarian in nature with almost 70% of the population directly dependent on Agriculture as a source of income. However, the scenario in terms of productivity and production has been mixed. Though we have achieved self sufficiency in rice, the staple crop, fruits & vegetables, we still have a shortfall in overall requirement of oilseed, pulses and potato etc. The AACP is trying to diversify the agriculture through irrigation to increase cropping intensity and thereby to increase net income of the farmers. It emphasizes on participation of farmers in planning, implementation, monitoring and post management through Agricultural Technology Management Agency (ATMA) model and orientation of extension towards lead marketing. As a whole, the programme targets to achieve a sustainable agricultural growth in Assam. In Assam a major part of the cultivable land is cultivated for one time in the whole year only because of poor irrigation system. In order to treat this setback, AACP has mainly put its interest for irrigation component. As outcome, it is observed that the production of Irrigated or Boro paddy is many times high than the production of rain fed paddy. For the irrigation system the project has given a share of 50% costs of the Shallow Tubes Wells (STWs), Low Lift Pumps (LLP) to the economically poor farmers so that they also can afford irrigation facilities in their paddy field. For operational convenience, the whole Kamrup district is divided in to three divisions i.e. Guwahati, Rangia and Boko. During this period, the project has also provided pump sets by contributing 50 % of its total costs. Apart from the above activities, CRD has helped the farmers by giving them necessary information regarding quality seeds & other planting materials, improved method of crop production, linkage with other schemes under AACP, linkage with banks for KCC etc. Planning to Buy Rickshaw Get an instant quote from us about the Rickshaw. The concept of Joint Forest Management Committee (JFMC) Participatory Forest Management was initiated in the year 2005 under World Bank funded titled Natural Resource Management and Integrated livelihood (NaRMIL). In Kamrup district 6 JFMC were restructured and nurtured with the object improving sustainable livelihood of the communities through integrated approach of rural development and natural resource conversation in forest fringe communities within the broader framework of AACP through participatory planning implementation and monitoring. The AACP had started to work with the concept of joint forest management since 2005 with 6 JFMCs and on 2008 the number of JFMC was 8 nos. in Kamrup district but on seeing the progress of the project the ARIAS society has increased 2 more JFMCs in 2009. Therefore in 2009 CRD started with two new JFMCs viz. Pokapam-Bogaline JFMC in the Loharghat Range of Kamrup West Division and Dewan Beel JFMC in the Kulsi range of Kamrup West Division. The both JFMC started their plantation works during June-August during this financial period. Apart from the above activities in the project there is another effect that has been observed in the locality of the project areas. Once before implementation of the project the people had a fear to speak in public. But after the intervention of the NGOs in the grass root level they have got a number of information on income generating activities and various government schemes. Besides these, the reserved area inhabitants have been well trained on various income generating activities such as bee keeping, rearing of pig, food processing etc. This has enabled the villagers to gain confidence and come forward for conducting different developmental activities. The development of their village infrastructure is worth mentioning. As entry point activity the project renovated the village roads up to four kilometres, built community hall for arranging meeting and cultural programmes, prepared peoples nursery through which the locals has been benefited by selling the saplings. Assam Agricultural Competitiveness Project (AACP) is to ensure the participation of primary stakeholders to achieve sustainable development with the attempt to help the individuals, groups and communities to get a clear insight into the problems that strengthens their ego to face conditions as reality and try to improve them. CRD has been engaged with the attempts to mobilize the social capital, resolve the social and economic situations that lead to poverty and social unrest. The objectives of AACP is to encourage intensification and diversification of the agricultural and allied sectors by empowering rural producers, communities and forest dwellers to become more competitive and able to take advantage of emerging commercial opportunities. In fact, AACP is a second phase of Assam Rural Infrastructure and Agricultural Services Project (ARIASP) with greater emphasis on effectiveness agricultural services delivery and market linkages to increase the impact of investments from both ARIASP & AACP on house hold incomes. In these project we have selected two renown educational intuition student one is prarijat Guwahati, and another one is Pragarlya jorhat. From these intuition few student had been selected for the program and related technical skill and work experience opportunitywas provided to them with free of cost in the Rickshaw bank factory at Guwahati. We all know that such training program always helps overall growth of the student which enables them to catch up their future goals more easily. We Centre for Rural Development always feel pleased to provide such opportunity to student where experience, exposure is being given to the student in order to make their future career more fruitful. We given thanks to AFNA for their support to making this interne program successful one and we both parties planning to organized more such program in future. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Blog Home  Blog  Livelihood integration Program At Goalpara 2014 Livelihood integration Program At Goalpara 2014 Posted by CRD on March 29, 2015 Livelihood integration program at Goalpara (Phase One): We all knew that last year in Assam devastating flood has damage adversely in the district of Goalpara, Assam where thousands of family became homeless due to sudden flood. More than 70% people of the district had been suffered badly due to flood where many of among them have lost their life. It is difficult to imagine how natural disaster could become a devastating without being physically visited the affected site. We centre for rural development and local NGO Purbanchal Circle Goalpara jointly made a little effort to bring back those smiles in the faces of who have lost its glimpse in recent flood where many rural poor people of Goalpara district have lost everything whatever they had. To provided some assistance to affected people, we both Centre for rural development(CRD) and local ngo Purbanchal circle organized a Livelihood integration program in Agya,Goalpara district where different livelihood item were being provided to the affected people .Many affected people of Goalpara district have been covered under this livelihood integration program where hens, spinning wheels,etc were being distributed among them to carry their life forward once again after flood has left nothing for them.Mr Subhash Sarmah Board member of Centre for rural development(CRD) was attended in that programs where he expressed his view about how people should react in whenever such sudden natural disaster occurred and what are the immediate safety measure need to be taken in such scenario. After that Mr.Pankaj Neog project coordinator Centre for rural development expressed his view about how such livelihood integration programs can make a huge positive impact on the society as well as affected people life without having any doubat.At the closing ceremony of the programs all the livelihood item had been distributed among the affected people by the Centre for rural development (CRD) representative and people shown their acknowledgement towards their little effort. Livelihood integration program at Goalpara (Phase two): As per routine program the second phase of livelihood integration program was held at Goalpara district in the month of febuary2015.These programs main objective was to provide necessary support to the remaining affected people of the recent flood which took place in Goalpara district, of Assam. In that devastating flood more than 70 thousand people of rural Goalpara district had been affected badly and they have lost their everything. We Centre for Rural Development (CRD) and Purbanchal Circle had taken a joint initiative to extend our selfless help, support carry to those affected people who were being made helpless by recent devastating flood. More or less we have tried to cover almost all affected people under this livelihood programs through which we have try to make them economically sound once again after flood had taken away everything from them. In the second phase of the programs we have distributed same number of different, hens, spinning wheels etc to each and every remaining affected people. Its gives us immense pleasure to be part of such programs where full effort has been made towards uplift the socio-economic status of the poor rural people once again after recent flood has left nothing for them. In that programs Centre for Rural Development (CRD) board member Mr.Subhash Sarmah and Mr. Pankaj Neog coordinator Vikaspedia, have attended the program and shared their thought about such livelihood integration programs and its actual social motto. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us ODF (Open Defecation Free) Home  ODF (Open Defecation Free) OPEN DEFECATION FREE Open defecation(also used in the opposite meaning asopen defecation free(ODF)) is the human practice ofdefecatingoutside (in the open environment) rather than into atoilet. People may choose fields, bushes, forests, ditches, streets, canals or other open space for defecation. They do so because either they do not have a toilet readily accessible or due to traditional cultural practices.The practice is common wheresanitationinfrastructure and services are not available. Even if toilets are available,behavior changeefforts may still be needed to promote the use of toilets. The term open defecation free (ODF) is used to describe communities that have shifted to using a toilet instead of open defecation. This can happen for example, aftercommunity-led total sanitationprograms have been implemented. The government of India with help of partners like UNICEF is looking at the challenge of Open Defecation Free India . The government has a target to make India Open Defecation Free by 2019 and UNICEF India is a key partner in its flagship programme to achieve this target through Swatchh Bharat Mission. Under the SBM, throughout the country large number of villages is declared as ODF villages. In this particular project Center for Rural Development (CRD) organize various field level meetings, creating awareness on Cleanliness & Hygiene, CRD is engaging more into this survey and in many districts of Assam. ODF survey is an ongoing project of Centre for Rural Development, CRD team in listed districts visited 45000 households & 1500 villages within the span of 6 months time, and so far we have covered Goalpara, Barpeta, Dhubri & Nagaon districts. In next phase of survey we will be covering 50,000 households in 6 districts of Assam. CRD is playing its role to support sustainable livelihood of poor people by using local resources and skills through community participation. Assam Agricultural Competitiveness Project (AACP) is an ongoing project of Govt. of Assam funded by the World Bank. The programme is meant for the development of agricultural infrastructure and market-led extension service to enhance livelihood for the rural people. The project has its four different components in Kamrup district i.e. Agriculture, Fishery, Dairy and Forestry. While technical services of the programme are being rendered by the relevant line departments, the social mobilization process has been facilitated by Non- Governmental Organizations (NGO) in each districts of Assam. The AACP is mainly facilitating market driven agricultural intensification and diversification by assisting farmers to become more competitive and able to take advantage on emerging economic opportunities. Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary Awards & Honors Volvo Sustainable Mobility Award Best E-North East Award Asian Development Bank Meeting Social Enterprise Award 2018 Project Shine LED ODF (Open Defecation Free) Vikaspedia News Programs Internship Contact Us Enhancing The Operational Framework Home  Rickshaw Bank  Enhancing The Operational Framework Rickshaw Bank Progress In Assam Enhancing The Operational Framework STED Social Mobilization Act Under AACP World Bank Funded Program Role Of CRD Progress In Agriculture Progress In Fishery Progress In Forestry Progress In Diary In order to give an impetus to the existing operation of the Rickshaw Bank project, CRD has organized several in house workshops. These are meant to relay the past activities, reflect their learning and give ways for further development. In the workshop, discussion was held on technical as well as social aspects of the project. Finally, a model guideline is prepared for enabling the staff to boosts up the operator. In social aspects, emphasis has been given upon the homogenous group formation based on the original home place, existing dwelling locality in city /town, age-group and caste. However it is very difficult to maintain caste-based, income based homogently and affinity based groups in big city like Guwahati as therein people from different states, district come in search of live hood. In small towns like Nalbari, Mirza; these kind of homogeneity is observed and accordingly the rickshaw puller were encouraged to from groups. Besides, changes have been brought to the earlier concept of garage that comprises 5 group of 25 rickshaw puller All the puller under a garage form the general association of the rickshaw puller in a locality within the city. Town .This is direct interface between rickshaw puller and branch coordinator and /or above position at garage level. Steps have been taken for promotion of Rickshaw Puller Cooperative Socitey.The people at CRD and members of the project are positive that a few added features to the operational framework would ensure the implementation of the project with enabling approach of development rather than service delivery method . We are working on Project called SHINE-LED supported by bright spark Energy Pvt.ltd. Pilot project has been started in Dharmanagar North District of Tripura, goal of this particular project is to reduce Carbon Emission. We have covered 3,200 households and distributed 9600 Led bulbs. Through this particular project we are replacing ICL Bulbs with LED bulbs. In our Pilot project we have distributed 96000 LEDs, 4800  14 Watt against 100 Watt ICL bulbs & 4800  9 Watt Against 60 Watt ICL Bulbs , 412800  Saving Electricity against -14 Watt, 244800  Saving Electricity against  9 Watt. In this way we are saving 6,57600 watt per hour electricity for state . While working in this project we have come across various social issues, which is helping us, find out the social, cultural value & connecting to the root. This project will be executed in 8 States of North east & will cover approximately 1.5 cores household . Planning to Buy Rickshaw Get an instant quote from us about the Rickshaw. The team also looks at ways and means to improve the existing tradition milk markets. AACP has formed 39 numbers of DCS in Kamrup district in between 2005 to 2009. During 09-10 field coordinators linked up the members of the DCS to Central Dairy and other milk processing and dairy units for better price and continuous market channel. However the problems in the rural areas of Assam is that the road communication is very poor and there are some areas where the milk producers cannot access the artificial insemination service though they have interest for high yielding cows. It is true that after formation of the DCS the members of DCS and the neighbouring milk producers got lot of technical knowledge on quality control, clean milk production and maintenance of the cowshed. CRD has also formed one Women DCS. It is one of the successful cooperative societies in Assam and the members have linked up with other departments and bank for enhancing their economic activities in the long run.
